articles.title: Argentina prepares to restrict imports amid foreign exchange shortage -source
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Argentina's government will launch three measures in the coming days aimed at restricting imports and preserving the central bank's dwindling foreign currency reserves, a source told Reuters on Tuesday.The measures come as new data on Monday showed a trade deficit in July of $437 million, the second deficit in a row for Latin America's
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Argentina's government will launch three measures in the coming days aimed at restricting imports and preserving the central bank's dwindling foreign currency reserves, a source told Reuters on Tuesday.

articles.description: In Argentina, a little boy lost his father in a crowd. However, the people there quickly came to help him, and what happened next will warm your heart. Take a look.
articles.content:

articles.title: LATAM POLITICS TODAY-Argentina prosecutor seeks 12-year jail sentence for VP Kirchner
articles.description: Argentina names second in command of economy ministry BUENOS AIRES - Argentina's government has appointed a well-known economist and vocal critic of the policies of former President and current Vice President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner to effectively be the second in command of the economy ministry.
articles.content:
The latest in Latin American politics today: Argentina prosecutor seeks 12-year jail sentence for VP

articles.title: Placido Domingo's name comes up in Argentina sex sect probe
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Opera star Placido Domingo's name has appeared in an investigation of a sect-like organization in Argentina that also had U.S. offices and whose leaders have been charged with crimes, including sexual exploitation.
